settings.text:
Whether you choose to give birth at home, at a birthing center, or a hospital, I will be by your side throughout labor to provide encouragement, comfort, and information when questions arise.

Beginning at 37 weeks, I will be available 24/7 on call. After contacting me at onset of labor, I will be constantly available via phone, video call, and text to provide support as you labor at home or with you at your preferred delivery location through the duration of labor. You can call me for any question, no matter how big or small, anything you need your doula for.

I will remain with you in the immediate hours after your baby is born to assist in skin-to-skin bonding and feeding your baby. I will also arrange to visit with you once you are settled at home, to discuss your experience, give support at home, and see how life is with your new bundle.

Your experienced doula will be by your side throughout your labor, providing continuous support, encouragement, and comfort, regardless of your chosen birth location (home, birthing center, or hospital). Every doula comes with a tool kit including:

  • Rebozo: Utilizing the traditional Mexican technique of using a shawl-like cloth, your doula will provide gentle and soothing movements to help ease tension and promote relaxation.
  • Birthing Ball: Your doula will assist you in using a birthing ball, a large inflatable ball, as a tool for comfort, support, and optimal positioning during labor.
  • Breathing Techniques: Your doula will guide you through various breathing techniques to manage pain so you stay relaxed, feel calm and focused on birthing your baby.
  • Complimentary Birth Photography and Video: As a special gift, your doula will capture precious moments of your labor and birth through photography and video, which will be provided to you on a flash drive to treasure for a lifetime.
  • Birth Room Ambiance: Your doula will create a calming and soothing environment in your birth room with a Himalayan salt lamp, tiny tea lights, essential oil diffuser for aromatherapy, arnica massage oil and many more tools specific to your needs.

With our comprehensive support through labor, you can feel secure, like we have your back! And your front too :)

Contact Us >
